intro: Solve creative challenges with your camera in this puzzle platformer game.
description:
Randy dreams of becoming a great photographer. To help him, his grandfather lends him his camera, promising that he can keep it if he proves he’s ready.

Explore a world full of challenges that you can overcome by using your camera in creative ways. Earn photographer badges by collecting film rolls in each level and show that you have what it takes to succeed.

But remember, the camera is just a tool, what truly matters is your creativity!

Features
• Travel across diverse thematic worlds, from lush green fields to a food world, and even outer space.
• Use your camera to capture and move objects, eliminate them to reset their positions, and use your creativity to overcome challenges.
• Collect as many film rolls as possible to earn badges and prove your photography skills.
• Unlock and wear fun costumes while exploring the worlds.
